page.title: 19LOCAL ATTITUDES-HOLKER MOSS
page.content: The few people that live in this area regard it very highly for its peace and relative isolation.Many of them have lived here all their lives and their families go back several generations in the area.Inspite of the total lack of services few would consider moving away. The lack of a bus service or other forms of public transport is not important to most.Private transport is an accepted essential part of life so that inhabitants can use the sevices of the nearby settlements.The nearest primary school is a few kilometres away at Flookburgh and Ulverston Market is important to the local growers and farmers. The area has changed only slowly over the years and this is a situation that local people hope will continue into the future.
